text: Honeymoon for Three may refer to the following films: * A Honeymoon for Three, a 1910 short starring J. Warren Kerrigan * Honeymoon for Three (1915 film), a British comedy directed by Maurice Elvey * Honeymoon for Three (1935 film), a British musical featuring Stanley Lupino * Honeymoon for Three (1941 film), an American romantic comedy starring Ann Sheridan and George Brent *Honeymoon for Three (novel), a 1975 novel by Ugandan novelist Jane Bakaluba ==See also== * Three on a Honeymoon (disambiguation)
title: Honeymoon for Three
